responsibilities: Build with impact, empowering millions of users through Fintech Applications with access to financial services.
Experiment with cutting edge ML modeling techniques.
Work on both 0-1 stage problems as well as 1-10.
Develop AI/ML models in a full life cycle, from offline training to online serving and monitoring.
Collaborate with teams across Plaid to define ML roadmap.
Dive deep into data and apply data-driven decisions in day-to-day work.
Be part of a high ownership, bottom-up driven team.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities mention experimenting with cutting-edge ML modeling techniques and developing AI/ML models in a full life cycle. While these responsibilities indicate a focus on machine learning and model development, there is no specific mention of language models or fine-tuning them for domain-specific tasks. The responsibilities seem more general in the context of AI/ML rather than specifically related to large language models.
